doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 超出工单各环节时限情况统计表

sql.name: Tshf_form_sum
sql.item: select '话费类投诉细分' as 类别, buss.c801800003 as 项目, buss.c801800004 as 项目, buss.c801800005 as 项目,buss.c801800006 from {100} buss where buss.c801800001='投诉' and buss.c801800002='话费类' order by buss.c801800007 desc

sql.name: Tshf_form_sum_number
